src:
IZ*ONE reveals group shots for 'BLOOM*IZ'
01 Nov 2019, 15:11 by sl278



IZ*ONE has revealed new group shots for their upcoming album 'BLOOM*IZ'.
The girls are bringing back pastels and elegance in their group shot teasers, showing off their beautiful visuals and charm. 
Stay tuned for more updates and check out the photos below!
